model.name: LV Spread Embroidery T-Shirt
model.disambiguatingDescription: This classic t-shirt is given a distinctive twist with an embroidered motif in contrasting thread, featuring tiny scattered L and V letters that coalesce on the chest while leaving a larger LV signature in the space between the stiches. Made from compact cotton jersey with a ribbed collar, it has an inside-out construction and label on the back.
